CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c,"Rejected")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c,"Pending")), Stop_automatic_renewal__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Account.Automatic_Renewal__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), NOT(ISBLANK(Last_Notice_Day__c)), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")), OR( Last_Notice_Day__c = Today()+30, Last_Notice_Day__c = Today()+3, Last_Notice_Day__c <= Today()-1))
CustomField.label: Flow: Last Notice Day
